name: repos_create-autolink
description: Users with admin access to the repository can create an autolink.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

is_alphanumeric.description: Whether this autolink reference matches alphanumeric characters. If true, the `<num>` parameter of the `url_template` matches alphanumeric characters `A-Z` (case insensitive), `0-9`, and `-`. If false, this autolink reference only matches numeric characters.

key_prefix.description: The prefix appended by a number will generate a link any time it is found in an issue, pull request, or commit.

url_template.description: The URL must contain `<num>` for the reference number.

$ul: **key_prefix**: The prefix of a key that is linkified.
**url_template**: A template for the target URL that is generated if a key was found.
